EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Dallas_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 8 August 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
Pivotal Dallas Office 3001 Hackberry Rd, Irving TX 75063 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3001+Hackberry+Rd,+Irving,+TX+75063/@32.9253229,-96.9878627,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c299f7ae50267:0x363018885ba50150!8m2!3d32.9253184!4d-96.985674?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/dallas?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
